title: Best of The Program | Guest: Christopher Rufo | 9/24/20
description:
Protesters took to the streets after no cops were charged for the death of Breonna Taylor. Glenn and Stu give the real story of that tragic night. Glenn reviews last night’s show: We’re now seeing an orchestrated “bottom-up” movement toward color revolution and the Great Reset. Trump refused to confirm he’d step down after the election if he loses. Writer Christopher Rufo talks Trump expanding his ban on critical race theory trainings in his administration and the latest efforts by Seattle to defund the police.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
